boardgame.name: Waggle Dance
boardgame.description: Build a beehive, collect nectar, and make honey while also being efficient, being strategic, and outmaneuvering your opponents!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Waggle Dance, a Euro-style worker-placement dice game for 2-4, players control worker bees to build their hive, produce more bees, collect nectar, return it to the hive and make honey! (What is a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;waggle dance_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; you ask? It's a series of patterned movements performed by a scouting bee to tell other bees in the colony the direction and distance of a food source or hive site.)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players need to organize their bees to make as much honey as possible to see the hive through the coming winter. The winner is the first player to successfully create 7 or more honey tokens in their hive. It's up to you how to achieve this: Do you focus on nectar collection, increasing your bee population, expanding your hive, seeking favor with the queen, or splitting your resources to accomplish all of these? Whatever you choose, the natural world is a competitive environment and you can be sure the other players will be looking to maximize their advantage._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Waggle Dance is designed to be a highly accessible language independent game with a simple rule-sheet appealing to all levels of gamers._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2015 UK Games Expo Best Family Game Winner

Waggle Dance by Grublin Games This is a brand new, shrink wrapped copy of the game. --Payments-- - PayPal is used for all online transactions - Cash is accepted for pickups from our store (see collections). --Postage (UK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Europe)-- -UK Shipping: £3 (additional £2 surcharge to N.I.) -Europe _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Channel Islands, please contact me for details Parcels are sent using MyHermes (though I reserve the right to change couriers at any time). This item is tracked and insured to the value of £20. If additional insurance is required please contact me to arrange (Buyer pays additional cost). I aim to dispatch all items within 72hrs of receiving payment and delivery normally takes 3-5 working days. If multiple items are bought I will combine shipping, please contact me to arrange this. I recycle packaging wherever possible to keep shipping costs as low as I am able. --Collection-- Your item can be collected from my store in Berkshire (RG45 7AD). Please contact info@thegameshunter.co.uk to arrange. Selecting this option will avoid any shipping costs. I also attend games nights in Reading and Wokingham and can bring these with me. Again this avoids shipping costs, contact me to arrange. --Returns-- If you are unhappy with the product, please contact info@thegameshunter.co.uk within 7 working days and we will attempt to resolve the matter. Unopened copies of the game that are no longer wanted can be returned, but there is a 10% restocking fee payable of the item price and the Buyer is responsible for the return shipping costs. --Multiple Purchase Discounts-- I am happy to offer discounts if multiple marketplace purchases are made. Please e-mail beforehand to discuss.

Missing one card. There was apparently an issue in the manufacturing process that left one of the card sets with only 2 instead of 3. This is a known issue to the publisher, and you can contact them for a replacement card (which I have not bothered to do). See this thread for more info on the issue and how to contact the publisher if interested: https://www.boardgamegeek.com/thread/1276694/scouting-card-only-2-not-3-included. Played once. Flimsy insert has some damage from shipping from UK. Item is in very good condition. I treat my games very well. If there are components inside the game they are most likely bagged in 4mm, thick bags. I ship via USPS, which is most cost effective. When I ship things I take extra measurers to mitigate any potential shipping damage. Shipping from 98012. Here’s some shipping ESTIMATES to help you get an idea of what it will cost. Your distance from my Zip Code (98012) and box weight are the biggest factors in price. Please ask ahead of time if you want to know your shipping! If you place an order and cancel it after I provide you with shipping, you will get negative feedback. Small Card Game (i.e. 6 nimmt or Hanabi) $3-$6 / USPS First Class or Priority Bubble Mailer Thin Medium Sized (i.e. Concept, Las Vegas) $8-$10 / Priority Mail Thick Medium Sized (i.e. Istanbul, King of Tokyo, Russian Railroads) $10-$13 / Priority Mail Big Box Games (i.e. Ticket to Ride, 7 Wonders) $16-$18 / Priority Mail or Parcel Post Oversized or Odd Shaped Boxes ($22-$25) / Parcel Post
